definitions.title: vb. Pi.
definitions.body: dash in pieces (cf. Targum [[רְטַשׁ]] cast away, reject; but possibly akin to [[לָטַשׁ]]);—

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Impf. 2 ms. [[תְּרַטֵּשׁ]] 2Ki 8:12 their children thou will dash in pieces; 3 fpl. [[קְשָׁתוֹת]] [[נְעָרִיםשׁ תְּרַטַּשְׁנׇה]] Is 13:18, but prob. crpt., Du conj. [[נְעָרוֹת תְּרֻטַּשְׁנׇה]] cf. Che.

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. [[אֵם עַל־]] [[בָּנִים רֻטָָּשָׁה]] Ho 14:14; Impf. 3 mpl. [[יְרֻטְּשׁוּ]] Is 13:16, Na 3:10, [[יְרֻטָָּשׁוּ]] Ho 14:1, all of children.
